name: part_006
file: tmp_【チラ見せ】ReGLOSS 1st Live ＂Flashpoint＂【有明アリーナ】 [wlPLYUOmtHE]_gemini-3-pro-preview/reencoded/part_006.mov

scenes.description: Introductory sequence of the ReGLOSS 1st Live 'Flashpoint'. Features crowd shots, member introductions with on-screen text, and a countdown.
Performance of the song 'Feeling Gradation' by ReGLOSS.

subtitles.original: Otonose Kanade
subtitles.english: Otonose Kanade

subtitles.original: Ichijou Ririka
subtitles.english: Ichijou Ririka

subtitles.original: Juufuutei Raden
subtitles.english: Juufuutei Raden

subtitles.original: Todoroki Hajime
subtitles.english: Todoroki Hajime

subtitles.original: Flashpoint
subtitles.english: Flashpoint

subtitles.original: My heart starts skipping a beat
subtitles.english: My heart starts skipping a beat

subtitles.original: 紐解いた新章
subtitles.english: A new chapter has been unraveled

subtitles.original: 様変わりしてく Show time
subtitles.english: The show time is completely changing

subtitles.original: 全然悪くないイマジネーション
subtitles.english: An imagination that's not bad at all

subtitles.original: 視界の霧は晴れ渡って
subtitles.english: The mist in my vision clears up

subtitles.original: 悲しみに別れを告げる
subtitles.english: Bidding farewell to sadness

subtitles.original: 酸いも甘いも宙に放り出して
subtitles.english: Throwing both sourness and sweetness into the air

subtitles.original: 滲む空 インクは薔薇色
subtitles.english: The bleeding sky, the ink is rose-colored

subtitles.original: どれだけ上手く魅せようとしても
subtitles.english: No matter how well I try to show it off

subtitles.original: キミがいなければ何の意味もない
subtitles.english: Without you, it means nothing

subtitles.original: 擦り傷すらつかない幻想
subtitles.english: An illusion that won't even leave a scratch

subtitles.original: 針の落ちないレコードさ
subtitles.english: It's a record where the needle never drops

subtitles.original: たった今とめどない追い風背にして
subtitles.english: Right now, with an endless tailwind at our backs

subtitles.original: Come on Let's roll
subtitles.english: Come on Let's roll

subtitles.original: 颯爽と吹き荒れる向かい風にも
subtitles.english: Even against the dashing headwind that rages

subtitles.original: 心なびかせて
subtitles.english: Let our hearts flutter
